snippet.title: Skelethrone: The Prey - Official Gameplay Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
#skelethronetheprey #skelethrone
Skelethrone: The Prey is available now Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2139870/Skelethrone_The_Prey/

The Prey is a free prequel to the main game, setting the stage for the events that will unfold throughout Skelethrone: The Chronicles of Ericona campaign.

This game is a challenging 2D action platformer with RPG elements inspired by games like Castlevania and Dark Souls.
